reviewText: Outstanding drama with humor and lots of suspense. Well acted and fabulous script for the obtuse English professor.
so pleased to receive it, thankyou

The quality of the DVD was horrific.  The picture was so blurry as to be barely visible and the sound was equally bad.  It's a good thing that we know the movie so well so we could follow it. Do Not Buy This Product it's a disaster and a ripoff !!!
